traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: Can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d10 + 2) Piercing, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends, the target has the Restrained condition, and the crocodile can't bite another target.
